snippet.title: Fun Run 2 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Download for iOS: http://itunes.apple.com/app/fun-run-2...
Download for Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...
Download for Amazon: http://www.amazon.com/Fun-Run-2-Multiplayer-Race/dp/B00U0O4ENU
Download for Windows Phone: https://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/fun-run-2-multiplayer-race/93532df5-5cb1-4b89-b902-abb992fffb51


Fun Run is back with all new levels, characters and lots of new swag. Crush your friends, or race random players from all over the world.

All the cutest, furriest creatures of the forest are out running. For you to remain a cool critter, it is essential that you finish the race before your furry friends.

No amount of force is excessive.

Fun Run 2 is an online real-time multiplayer game for smartphones and tablets, Android, iOS, Amazon, and now Windows Phone. You can be anywhere in the world and play up to four players simultaneously. Play with your friends or get matched with random players from around the world!
